definition: located on the right side of a ship or aircraft, the right side of a ship or aircraft to someone who is aboard and facing the bow or nose, turn to the right, of helms or rudders
details:
adjective
- located on the right side of a ship or aircraft
noun
- the right side of a ship or aircraft to someone who is aboard and facing the bow or nose
verb
- turn to the right, of helms or rudders
